definition[0]_en: A scale designation for a still image or three-dimensional form that is not to scale.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A scale designation for a still image or three-dimensional form that is not to scale.

definition[0]_en: A scale designation for a resource when no scale can be determined.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A scale designation for a resource when no scale can be determined.

definition[0]_en: A scale designation for a resource whose scale is variable across the resource, when the range of values cannot be determined.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A scale designation for a resource whose scale is variable across the resource, when the range of values cannot be determined.

definition[0]_en: A scale designation for a resource consisting of more than one image, map, etc., with different scales.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A scale designation for a resource consisting of more than one image, map, etc., with different scales.
